name: HideableStrictOption

members.name: value
members.description: Machine value of the option; this is the value passed to `onChange`

members.name: disabled
members.description: Option will be visible, but not selectable

members.name: prefix
members.description: Element to display to the left of the option label. Does not show in the dropdown.

members.name: key
members.description: Unique key applied to the option element. Defaults to option value prop when undefined.
